Author: Walter Mafokate
Post Content: I feel like people misunderstand how the soft cap fromOrange, Mascom and BTC work. You can pay whichever amount you pay but once you have reached your softcap limit the internet speed will go down hence why y'all complain about it. If you want truly unlimited speed then subscribe for Jenny, Nashua and other ISP because complaining won't solve any of your problems. Softcap means that your speed is to be high until you get to your data limit.
